marklogic.body: i will be printing this to give to my daughters school. good information and easy to follow. My 9 yr. old daughter had a sleep study which indicated a strong tendency for narcolepsy, and just had bloodwork done to test for a genetic marker for narcolepsy which turned out to be POSITIVE. After searching for an answer for her Tiredness for almost 3 years, I am overcome with Joy to be able to put a name to this. I have been told that this is a lifetime illness, but feel positive that we will deal with this one day at a time. Hope research continues so that narcoleptics can live as normal a life as possible in the future.
